sen.j: 中臣 勝海（なかとみのかつみ、生年未詳 - 用明天皇2年（587年）4月）は、飛鳥時代の豪族。
sen.e: NAKATOMI no Katsumi (date of birth unknown - April 587) was a local ruling clan of the Asuka period.

sen.j: 敏達天皇14年（585年）3月、物部守屋と共に、疫病流行の原因が蘇我氏の仏教信仰のせいであると奏上。
sen.e: In March 585, he and MONONOBE no Moriya reported to the Emperor that the spreading of an epidemic should be attributed to the Soga clan's believing in Buddhism.

sen.j: 用明天皇2年（587年）4月、天皇が病床で仏教に帰依する旨を詔し、群臣にこのことを協議するように命じた際にも、守屋と共に詔に反対している。
sen.e: When the ailing Emperor ordered his servants to discuss his becoming a devout believer in Buddhism in April 587, Moriya and Katsumi opposed it.

sen.j: その後、守屋の挙兵に呼応して、自宅に兵を集め、押坂彦人大兄皇子の像と竹田皇子の像を作り呪詛するが、反乱計画の不成功を知って彦人大兄に帰服。
sen.e: He and Moriya took up arms at his residence and cursed Oshisaka no Hikohito no Oenomiko and Takeda no Miko (the Imperial Prince Takeda) by creating dolls that mimic them but ended up yielding at Oshisaka no Hikohito no Oenomiko after learning that their rebel plot had failed.
